## Problem 2

Create dataframe containing names of data files.
```{r}
longitudinal_df = 
  tibble(files = list.files("./data/"))
```


Add data from each file to dataframe.
```{r}
longitudinal_df =
  longitudinal_df %>% 
  mutate(data = map(file.path("./data/", files), read_csv))
```
